content: *using a double strand of babysoft in six pastel shades and white creates a beautiful spectrum of baby colors that softly dissolve into each other the color combination is perfect for boys and girls lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20269 skill level intermediate babysoft® article #920 6 colors 7 balls total 920-100 white 2 balls plus 1 ball each pastel pink pastel yellow pastel green pastel blue lavender crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitch v_stitch afghan is worked vertically from one side to the other with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout work blanket in v_stitch pattern changing colors held together creates a blended stripe effect crochet edging and add optional fringe to finish
